gnat.filter.ner
Class RunGoDictionary

java.lang.Object
  gnat.filter.ner.RunGoDictionary
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class RunGoDictionary
extends java.lang.Object
implements Filter

Runs a local or remote Dictionary tagger for GeneOntology terms on each text.
Recognized GO codes are stored in each Text's ContextModel, with the model type GeneContextModel.CONTEXTTYPE_GOCODES.

If static annotations of PubMed IDs etc. to GO codes are available, use a GOFilter to load these from a relational database.

Author:
Conrad, Joerg
See Also:
GOFilter

filter in interface Filter

filter

private void filter(java.util.Collection<Text> texts)
Processes all texts in the text repository by calling the remote server and adds the outcome, i.e. recognized entities and candidate ids, to the context.
